welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Isny im Allgau, a charming and picturesque city known for its stunning landscape and rich history. We invite you to experience all that our beautiful city has to offer and make unforgettable memories during your stay."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memmingen-Allgäu Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for seasonal and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Altenrhein Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
